name: Godspeed Color Theme (LTT)
description:
Recolors the LinusTechTips forum to match the XDA Godspeed theme. Looks even better when combined with my rounding style!
**Only works with Day Theme 2.1, DOES NOT WORK WITH NIGHT THEME**
additional_info:
V1 - Upload
V1.1 - Minor fixes and support for floatplane
V1.2 - Polished header image a little bit; Minor Fixes
V1.3 - Updated with missing changes
V1.4 - Updated with support for polls and a couple other minor fixes
